title: The Last Rock Emperor - Novel Updates
tags: Apocalypse   Brotherhood   Calm Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Futuristic Setting   Male Protagonist   Mutated Creatures   Mutations   Post-apocalyptic   Second Chance   Survival   Weak to Strong   Zombies
author: Mo Lai Feng   墨来疯
description: Zhu Yifan perishes fighting with his enemy during the apocalypse. Then he is reborn. He stares at his hands, which are smooth and youthful. It's hard to imagine that he fought for many years with this pair of hands. It turns out that he has returned to five hours before the apocalypse. What will he do to get ready?>
